source: Reward for inviting Kaeya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1103], equip this card.
After $[A1103] equips this card, immediately use $[S11032] once.
After your $[A1103], who has this card equipped, uses $[S11032], he heals himself for 2 HP. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1103] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
